document_data.mainbody:
Mees was the steward of Escanor Tanthul that lived in Thultanthar during the late 14 century DR.
Mees was quite skilled at understanding the wants of Prince Escanor with only the slightest hint or gesture.
Mees, Rapha, and the rest of Escanors attendants were present with the Prince of Shade when he met with Galaeron Nihmedu, Vala Thorsdotter, Aris, and Malik el Sami at Villa Dusari on Mirtul 9 in the .
